import { Playground, Props } from 'docz'
import Controls from './Controls'
import SubscriptionList from './SubscriptionList'
import { getCompareFunction, getAdjustedAmount } from '../util/util'
A sorting and search bar for use to parse a list
is a React component that allows parsing of a list via a text search and a sort selector.

<Playground>
  {() => {
    // see demo above, code example below is fully working React for a use case of Controls
    const [data, setData] = React.useState([
      {
        key: 'one',
        name: 'Netflicks',
        amount: '14.99',
        timePeriod: 'month',
        date: {
          day: 23,
          month: 2,
          year: 2020,
        },
        notes: 'these are some notes',
      },
      {
        key: 'two',
        name: 'Wholoo',
        amount: '24.99',
        timePeriod: 'week',
        date: {
          day: 12,
          month: 5,
          year: 2019,
        },
        notes: 'these are some notes also about wholoo',
      },
      {
        key: 'three',
        name: 'Rent',
        amount: '750.00',
        timePeriod: 'month',
        date: {
          day: 1,
          month: 7,
          year: 2018,
        },
        notes: 'these are some notes also about rent',
      },
      {
        key: 'three',
        name: 'Rent',
        amount: '750.00',
        timePeriod: 'month',
        date: {
          day: 1,
          month: 7,
          year: 2018,
        },
        notes: 'these are some notes also about rent',
      },
    ]);
    const [user, setUser] = React.useState(null);
    const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = React.useState(true);
    const [sortWith, setSortWith] = React.useState('byDate');
    const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = React.useState('');
    const [controlTimePeriod, setControlTimePeriod] = React.useState('default');
    const getFilteredData = () => {
      const tempData = [...data].sort(getCompareFunction(sortWith));
      if (searchTerm) {
        return tempData.filter((datum) => (
          datum.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1)
          || (datum.notes.toLowerCase().indexOf(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) > -1));
      }
      return tempData;
    };
    return (
      <>
        <Controls 
          darkMode={darkMode}
          sortWith={sortWith}
          setSortWith={setSortWith}
          searchTerm={searchTerm}
          setSearchTerm={setSearchTerm}
        />
        <SubscriptionList
          user={user}
          searchTerm={searchTerm}
          data={getFilteredData()}
          editSubscription={() => {}}
          deleteSubscription={() => {}}
          controlTimePeriod={controlTimePeriod}
        />
      </>
    );
  }}  
</Playground>
